testCase.name: characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters with default order
characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters ordered by name ascending
characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters ordered by name descending
characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters ordered by modified field ascending
characters-api getCharacters should return the list of characters ordered by modified field descending
characters-api getCharacterById should return the character with the given id
characters-api getCharacterById should throw an error if the character with the given id is not found
NumberOfCharacters renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
NumberOfCharacters renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
NumberOfCharacters renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
NumberOfCharacters renders "There is 1 character" when characters array has only one character
renders an empty list when no characters are provided
renders an empty list when characters is empty
renders the correct number of list items when characters are provided
updates the sort by and order options when changed
CharactersPage render CharactersPage component with order and orderBy from search params
CharactersPage render CharactersPage component with order and orderBy when the select changes
